page.title: 06Clubs around Holbeach Bank
page.content: {Saracen's Head.}On the Thursday of every week there is a youth club at Saracen's Head.There are drinks,sweets and crisps on sale. We play inside and outside the old school. There are 32 members.We go on outings and there are discos . We go roller skating and swimming .The ladies group is held once month.They have things like fashion shows and flower arrangement competitons.There is a dance club in the{Holbeach Bank}Reading Room.They do ball room dancing and it is for grown ups.You learn a new dance every week.There is a mothers and toddlers group every Wednesday afternoon in St. Martin's Church.Toddlers and mothers go and take toys to share.It is 35p. {Moulton Seas End.}The Youth Club costs 25p to get in. There are things to eat and drink . They play pool and mini-football.
